alert.note: Alert for Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 14 at 1:08PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...POTENT WINTER STORM CONTINUES... .A strong winter storm will continue to impact the region through tonight. Additional snow amounts will generally be highest across the northern Black Hills area, and southwest through south central South Dakota. Strong northwest winds gusting 35 to 50 mph at times on the South Dakota plains will continue to support blizzard or near blizzard conditions at times. Listen to NOAA Weather Radio or your local media for the latest updates on this storm. ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches from Spearfish to Sturgis, and 2 to 5 inches from Sturgis to Piedmont. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...The Northern Foot Hills and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will produce blizzard to near blizzard conditions at times.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
